item.description:
Intimate tattoos and skin art photoshoot on September 11, 2011

from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM.

I have changed the date for this photoshoot to September 11th because September 4th weekend happens to be the Boston Tattoo Convention, the models will be tied up with this event.

At this photoshoot you will focus on composing the shot specifically on the tattoos and with part of the model's body. The model still has to pose in an appropriate position that will display a beautiful human curvature with the tattoos upon it.

Currently there are five models and one MUA participating in this photoshoot. Previously I had to limit attendance to six photographers because I planed to have only one lighting setup, but after discovering that I had five models and a long waiting list, I plan to have two studio lighting
setups: first, a setup with constant lighting, and a second setup with strobe lights. This will increase the number of possible photographers to 10.

To attend this photoshoot you will need a fast lens (f2.8 or faster), if you have a macro lens (85mm or 105mm) then bring it with you. You will also need to bring your tripod (if you don’t have one, let me know I have two extra ones at my studio ).

Prior to the shoot, I will email you my suggestion for your preparation. It will be a challenging shoot but I am sure everyone will get some very special images from this shoot.

 

Please email me if you have additional questions.

NOTES:

     - FEE only apply to Photographers

     - Let me know if you have a hot light that you could bring wt you

------------------------------------------------------------------

MUA by Shelley Robinson:  http://eyefulbeauty.com/

Models:

1) Amanda O.

2) Caitlin P.

3) Colleen C.

4) Ashley H.

5) Nicole C.

--------------------------------------------------------------------
item.name: intimate tattoos and skin art photoshoot
